metadata.name: Mona's Bitcoin
metadata.description:
A bold abstract painting, but with a twist. This 1:1 is inspired by the iconic, Mona Lisa. It is a mixture of abstract styles, while also making reference to Bitcoin. A combination of 2 greats, BTC x Mona.

This high resolution painting will be paired with the BTC NFT, inscribed and delivered to the owner.

Having this piece on Ethereum allows the owner to enjoy the full detail of the piece.
